info.title: Simplified N-central API
info.description: This API specification has been simplified to remove authentication steps, handled by an intermediary Azure Function App.

servers.description: Proxy server that handles authentication and token management

post.description:
Create a direct-support schedule task against a specific device.
As a direct-support schedule task, the task will be executed immediately against a single device.
For more information about the request payload,
please review below the schema of the relevant data type:
    <a href="#model-DirectSuppo

201.description: Successful creation of direct support task.

get.summary: PREVIEW: Retrieve a list of all sites.
get.description:
Returns a list of all sites.


NOTE:This endpoint is currently in a preview stage.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve. Starts at 1. If not provided, defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Set to -1 to retrieve all items without pagination (if enabled).

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The name of a field to sort the result by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order in which the order will follow -- case insensitive and default to ASC.

get.summary: PREVIEW: Retrieve a list of all service organizations.
get.description:
Returns a list of all service organizations.


NOTE:This endpoint is currently in a preview stage.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve. Starts at 1. If not provided, defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Set to -1 to retrieve all items without pagination (if enabled).

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The name of a field to sort the result by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order in which the order will follow -- case insensitive and default to ASC.

get.summary: Return version information of the running API-Service.
Retrieves general information for a given task.
get.description: Retrieves general information for a given task using the task ID.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: ID of the task for which information is to be retrieved.

get.summary: Retrieves aggregated status for a given task.
get.description: Retrieves the aggregated status associated with a given task using the task ID.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: ID of the task for which aggregated status needs to be fetched.

get.summary: Retrieves detailed status per device for a given task.
get.description: Retrieve a list of detailed statuses for each device associated with the given task using the task ID.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: ID of the task for which detailed status needs to be fetched.

get.summary: PREVIEW: Retrieve a list of all organization units.
get.description:
Returns a list of all organization units.

NOTE:This endpoint is currently in a preview stage.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve. Starts at 1. If not provided, defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Set to -1 to retrieve all items without pagination (if enabled).

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The name of a field to sort the result by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order in which the order will follow -- case insensitive and default to ASC.

get.summary: Return the start and current time of the server. This indicates that the server is running.

get.description: Retrieves the list of devices from N-central for the logged in user.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve. Starts at 1. If not provided, defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Set to -1 to retrieve all items without pagination (if enabled).

get.description: Retrieves a device with a specific id.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the device for which information needs to be fetched.

get.summary: Retrieve tasks for a specific device.
get.description: Retrieves a list of tasks associated with a specified device using the device ID.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the device for which the tasks need to be fetched.

get.summary: PREVIEW: Retrieve Asset Information for a device by ID.
get.description:
Retrieves complete asset information for a device with a specific id.

NOTE:This endpoint is currently in a preview stage.
Also See: DeviceAssetInfoResponse

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: ID of the device for which asset information needs to be fetched.

200.description: Successful retrieval of device asset information.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all customers.
get.description: Returns a list of all customers.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve. Starts at 1. If not provided, defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Set to -1 to retrieve all items without pagination (if enabled).

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The name of a field to sort the result by.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order in which the order will follow -- case insensitive and default to ASC.

name.description: The name of the task. This value must be unique.

itemId.description: The ID of the remote execution item. The item ID can be found in the N-central UI ("Configuration" -> "Scheduled Tasks" -> "Script/software Repository") and it must have "Enable API" flag "ON" (see in the N-central UI).

taskType.description: The type of the task. Supported values: AutomationPolicy, Script or MacScript.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer. The customer ID can be obtained using the 'GET /api/customers' endpoint.

deviceId.description: The ID of the device. The device ID can be obtained using the 'GET /api/devices' endpoint.

parameters.description: The credential setting for the task. For more information about the fields of ScheduledTaskParameter, please review its schema below.

type.description: The credential type. Supported values: LocalSystem, DeviceCredentials and CustomCredentials.

ScheduledTaskCredential.description: Credentials for a remote execution task.

name.description: The parameter name. The value must not be empty.

description.description: The parameter name. The value must not be empty.

type.description: The parameter type. Supported values: string, integer, boolean, text, dword.

ScheduledTaskParameter.description:
Input Parameters of the task to be executed, whether it is an Automation Policy, a script, a MAC script, etc.
Parameters for an automation policy are defined according to the script repository item associated with
a given scheduled task.
For a script or a MAC script, the whole command line can be sp

TaskCreate.description: Information about a newly created task

siteId.description: The ID of the organization unit.

siteName.description: The name of the organization unit.

orgUnitType.description: The type of the organization unit (SYSTEM, SO, CUSTOMER or SITE).

parentId.description: The ID of the parent organization unit.

city.description: City where the organization unit is located.

stateProv.description: State or province where the organization unit is located.

country.description: Country where the organization unit is located.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the organization unit location.

contactEmail.description: Contact email for the organization unit.

Site.description: Data object for service organiztion organization.

soId.description: The ID of the organization unit.

soName.description: The name of the organization unit.

orgUnitType.description: The type of the organization unit (SYSTEM, SO, CUSTOMER or SITE).

parentId.description: The ID of the parent organization unit.

city.description: City where the organization unit is located.

stateProv.description: State or province where the organization unit is located.

country.description: Country where the organization unit is located.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the organization unit location.

contactEmail.description: Contact email for the organization unit.

ServiceOrganization.description: Data object for service organiztion organization.

AuthValidateResponse.description: Response for validating the authentication access token.

parentId.description: The unique identifier of the parent task (if applicable), or null if there is no parent task.

itemId.description: The unique identifier for the item associated with the task.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer associated with the task.

applianceId.description: The unique identifier of the appliance related to the task.

isReactive.description: Indicates whether the task is reactive (true) or not (false).

isEnabled.description: Indicates whether the task is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

deviceIds.description: List of device IDs that this task is run on.

items.description: List of device IDs that this task is run on.

additionalProperties.description: Map of status counts where keys are status names and values are status counts.

statusCounts.description: Map of status counts where keys are status names and values are status counts.

example.output: Task did not produce any output.

orgUnitId.description: The ID of the organization unit.

orgUnitName.description: The name of the organization unit.

orgUnitType.description: The type of the organization unit (SYSTEM, SO, CUSTOMER or SITE).

parentId.description: The ID of the parent organization unit.

city.description: City where the organization unit is located.

stateProv.description: State or province where the organization unit is located.

country.description: Country where the organization unit is located.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the organization unit location.

contactEmail.description: Contact email for the organization unit.

example.description: Network device discovered using Asset Discovery - 1299930810

DeviceAssetInfoResponse.description:
Represents a device asset info response.
It contains the asset information about the device in the form of following categories :
1. os
2. application
3. computersystem
4. networkadapter
5. device
6. processor

The above categories are classified as "default" categories and the fields under these ca
